summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, expressing support and acknowledging the difficulties faced by Staley. The email emphasizes confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege, indicating the sensitive nature of the communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, providing encouragement to Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, who is being commended for his efforts.

connections.description: Epstein expresses support for Staley, indicating a personal connection.

keyFacts: Epstein emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication.
Epstein acknowledges the difficulties faced by Staley and praises his efforts.
The email suggests a level of trust and personal connection between Epstein and Staley.
There is a mention of potential attorney-client privilege regarding the communication.
